description: Google Drive integration with file operations, folder navigation, search, and sharing
name: io.github.mcp-z/mcp-drive

environmentVariables.description: Google OAuth client ID (required for OAuth authentication modes)
environmentVariables.name: GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID

environmentVariables.description: Google OAuth client secret (optional for public clients)
environmentVariables.name: GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET

environmentVariables.description: Path to service account JSON key file (required for service-account auth mode)
environmentVariables.name: GOOGLE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_KEY_FILE

environmentVariables.description: Disable browser auto-open, return auth URL instead (true/false)
environmentVariables.name: HEADLESS

environmentVariables.description: OAuth redirect URI (optional, default: ephemeral loopback)
environmentVariables.name: REDIRECT_URI

environmentVariables.description: External verification endpoint URL (required for external DCR mode)
environmentVariables.name: DCR_VERIFY_URL

environmentVariables.description: DCR client storage URI (for self-hosted DCR mode)
environmentVariables.name: DCR_STORE_URI

environmentVariables.description: Base URL for HTTP file serving (defaults to http://localhost:{PORT})
environmentVariables.name: BASE_URL

packageArguments.description: Disable browser auto-open, return auth URL instead
packageArguments.name: --headless

packageArguments.description: Path to service account JSON key file (overrides GOOGLE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_KEY_FILE env var)
packageArguments.name: --service-account-key-file

packageArguments.description: External verification endpoint URL (required for external DCR mode)
packageArguments.name: --dcr-verify-url

packageArguments.description: DCR client storage URI (for self-hosted DCR mode)
packageArguments.name: --dcr-store-uri

packageArguments.description: Override directory for storing exported files
packageArguments.name: --storage-dir

packageArguments.description: Override base URL for HTTP file serving
packageArguments.name: --base-url

title: Google Drive
